text: pasuva dedenama gaman karannata vuha. ovun gamvasin keneku veta pæmini vita, taman dedenata aharayak laba dena men ema gamvasingen illa sitiyaha. namut ovun, e dedenata bhojana samgrahayak nokara æt vuha. pasuva ovun ehi vætennata hæki tatvaye tibu bittiyak dutuvaha. ebævin ohu (eyata mæti gasa pilisakara kara), eya (novæti) sitina se navata tæbuveya. (eyata musa ohuta) “oba kæmati vi (illa) tibune nam (me gavvasingen) meyata ayat kuliyak obata laba gannata hækiva tibuna noveda?”yi kiveya
